Name: Knock on the Coffin Lid
About the game: During the game, the main character has a path on which he will always face a hard choice: which way to the main goal will be right one? Help the dwarves to destroy the elven idol or pass by? Could you trust a huge orc? Do I even need such card in my deck? The choice, as well as all consequences it leads, depends only on you! More than 50 different events that can benefit you, or seriously complicate the rest of the game Valuable loot More than 150 unique items of equipment that directly affect the gameplay. Epic boss fights 12 bosses and 2 special hardcore bosses that will definitely not let you get bored And even more: - 4 biomes with their own unique inhabitants and conflicts - More than 150 cards are available for building a deck. Make your personal, unique playstyle! - Over 50 regular and 20 elite opponents - More than 6 sets of items to make your hero even stronger
